selected_skills.name: interpret_diagram_for_geometry
selected_skills.purpose: Extract the length and width of the rectangle from the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash to extract the dimensions of the rectangle.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Calculate the perimeter of the rectangle using the extracted dimensions.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Apply the formula 2 * (length + width) to compute the perimeter.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer for output.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the computed perimeter to generate the final answer string.
